short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy to use URL Shortener

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just click on the icon of this extension in toolbar to shorten the URL of current page with our url shortener service. Copy the shown url, click on the button to copy the url to your clipboard or just scan the qr-code with any device.

Completely free!
